title: Ai wa Chitto mo Rakuja Nai
description:
Koga, a jack of all trades, is sent to the house of Kamiyama, a famous novelist who hasn't published anything new in years.

Koga's first meeting with the beautiful, but abrasive and eccentric Kamiyama was a disaster, yet Kamiyama requested him back. Koga fearfully went to his house and suddenly got propositioned by Kamiyama?!
